variable.name: name
variable.description: Fully-qualified name of the component

variable.name: type
variable.description: Value is Pasture

variable.name: version
variable.description: Value is 1.0

variable.name: author
variable.description: Value is CSIRO Plant Industry

variable.name: active
variable.description: Denotes whether or not the component is active

variable.name: state
variable.description: SDML description of the current state

variable.name: assimilation
variable.description: Gross assimilation rate.

variable.name: avail_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of herbage available for grazing.

variable.name: avail_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of herbage available for grazing.

variable.name: avail_dm_q
variable.description: Dry weight of herbage available for grazing in each digestibility class.

variable.name: avail_dmd
variable.description: Average DM digestibility of herbage available for grazing.

variable.name: avail_dry
variable.description: Weight of dry (standing dead+litter) herbage available for grazing.

variable.name: avail_green
variable.description: Weight of green (seedling+established+senescing) herbage available for grazing.

variable.name: cover_green
variable.description: Green cover.

variable.name: cover_tot
variable.description: Total cover.

variable.name: dai
variable.description: Dead area index.

variable.name: dead_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of standing dead herbage.

variable.name: dead_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of standing dead herbage.

variable.name: dead_dm_q
variable.description: Dry weight of standing dead herbage in each digestibility class.

variable.name: dead_dmd
variable.description: Average DM digestibility of standing dead herbage.

variable.name: dead_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of standing dead herbage.

variable.name: dead_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of standing dead herbage.

variable.name: dead_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of standing dead herbage.

variable.name: dry_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of dry herbage (standing dead+litter).

variable.name: dry_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of dry herbage.

variable.name: dry_dm_q
variable.description: Dry weight of dry herbage in each digestibility class.

variable.name: dry_dmd
variable.description: Average DM digestibility of dry herbage.

variable.name: dry_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of dry herbage.

variable.name: dry_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of dry herbage.

variable.name: dry_s
variable.description: Total dry weight of effective roots.

variable.name: eff_root_dm
variable.description: Dry weight of effective roots in each soil layer.

variable.name: eff_root_dm_dep
variable.description: Weighted average value of the establishment index for seedlings.

variable.name: est_index
variable.description: Total dry weight of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: estab_cp
variable.description: Dry weight of herbage of established plants in each digestibility class.

variable.name: estab_dm
variable.description: Average DM digestibility of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: estab_dm_q
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: estab_dmd
variable.description: Average sulphur content of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: estab_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: estab_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: estab_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of herbage of established plants.

variable.name: gai
variable.description: Green area index.

variable.name: glf_gai
variable.description: Light interception growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_nitr
variable.description: Nitrogen growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_nutr
variable.description: Nutrient growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_phos
variable.description: Phosphorus growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_sm
variable.description: Soil moisture growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_sulf
variable.description: Sulphur growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_tmp
variable.description: Temperature growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_vpd
variable.description: VPD growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: glf_wl
variable.description: Waterlogging growth-limiting factor.

variable.name: green_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of green herbage.

variable.name: green_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of green herbage.

variable.name: growth
variable.description: Daily shoot growth rate.

variable.name: height
variable.description: Average height of the pasture.

variable.name: leaf_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of all leaves.

variable.name: leaf_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of all leaves.

variable.description: Average DM digestibility of all leaves.

variable.description: Average phosphorus content of all leaves.

variable.description: Average sulphur content of all leaves.

variable.description: Average crude protein content of litter.

variable.description: Total dry weight of litter.

variable.description: Dry weight of herbage of litter in each digestibility class.

variable.description: Average phosphorus content of litter.

variable.description: Average sulphur content of litter.

variable.name: n_fixed
variable.description: Nitrogen fixation rate.

variable.name: npp
variable.description: Net primary productivity of the population.

variable.name: residue_cover
variable.description: Cover of standing dead and litter.

variable.name: respiration
variable.description: Respiration rate, in dry weight equivalent terms.

variable.name: rlv
variable.description: Length density of effective roots in each soil layer.

variable.name: root_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of all roots.

variable.name: root_dm_dep
variable.description: Dry weight of all roots in each soil layer.

variable.name: root_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of all roots.

variable.name: root_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of all roots.

variable.name: root_radius
variable.description: Average radius of all roots.

variable.name: root_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of all roots.

variable.name: rtdep
variable.description: Current depth of the rooting front.

variable.name: rwu
variable.description: Actual water uptake by all plants in this population from each soil layer.

variable.name: seed_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of seeds.

variable.name: seed_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of seeds in all soil layers.

variable.name: seed_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of seeds.

variable.name: seed_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of seeds.

variable.name: seed_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of seeds.

variable.name: seedl_s

variable.description: Dry weight of herbage of senescing plants in each digestibility class.

variable.description: Average DM digestibility of herbage of senescing plants.

variable.name: senc_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of herbage of senescing plants.

variable.name: senc_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of herbage of senescing plants.

variable.name: senc_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of herbage of senescing plants.

variable.name: shoot_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of all herbage.

variable.name: shoot_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of all herbage.

variable.name: shoot_dm_q
variable.description: Dry weight of all herbage in each digestibility class.

variable.name: shoot_dmd
variable.description: Average DM digestibility of all herbage.

variable.name: shoot_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of all herbage.

variable.name: shoot_npp
variable.description: Net primary productivity of shoots.

variable.name: shoot_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of all herbage.

variable.name: shoot_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of all herbage.

variable.name: stem_cp
variable.description: Average crude protein content of all stems.

variable.name: stem_dm
variable.description: Total dry weight of all stems.

variable.name: stem_dm_q
variable.description: Dry weight of all stems in each digestibility class.

variable.name: stem_dmd
variable.description: Average DM digestibility of all stems.

variable.name: stem_n
variable.description: Average nitrogen content of all stems.

variable.name: stem_p
variable.description: Average phosphorus content of all stems.

variable.name: stem_s
variable.description: Average sulphur content of all stems.

variable.name: stress_index
variable.description: Weighted average value of the seedling stress index.

variable.name: uptake_nh4
variable.description: Ammonium-N uptake from each soil layer

variable.name: uptake_no3
variable.description: Nitrate-N uptake from each soil layer

variable.name: uptake_pox
variable.description: Phosphate-P uptake from each soil layer

variable.name: uptake_so4
variable.description: Sulphate-S uptake from each soil layer

variable.name: init_step
variable.description: Zeroes various cumulated quantities (e.g. herbage removal). Acquires the green mass, green area index and cover of other plants and computes totals for the field.

variable.name: do_pasture_water
variable.description: Computes demand for soil water.

variable.name: prewaterbalance
variable.description: Computes water demand and transmits it via a cropwaterdemand event.

variable.name: cropwatersupply
variable.description: Informs the component of the rate of water uptake by all plants of the species.

variable.name: do_pasture_growth
variable.description: Computes rates of development, growth and digestibility change of the species. Updates phenology state variables.

variable.name: end_step
variable.description: Obtains and computes removal of herbage by livestock. Obtains and adds residue inputs from other plant models. Updates remaining state variables.

variable.name: remove_herbage
variable.description: Removes plant shoots and seeds.

variable.name: residue_added
variable.description: Adds standing dead or litter.

variable.name: sow
variable.description: Adds a given amount of seed of the species.

variable.name: spraytop
variable.description: This event causes the pasture to mimic the effects of spraying with glyphosate.

variable.name: cultivate
variable.description: Kills the nominated proportion of the sward and incorporates the newly-dead material, along with the nominated proportion of dead, litter and seeds, into the soil.

variable.name: cut
variable.description: Removes all herbage down to a nominated threshold and makes it available for storage as hay.

variable.name: kill
variable.description: Kills the nominated proportions of herbage (including roots) and seeds.
